family.$description: Font family for avatar initials. Inherits from parent for consistency.

sm.$description: Font size for initials in small avatar (11px)

md.$description: Font size for initials in medium avatar (12px)

lg.$description: Font size for initials in large avatar (14px)

weight.$description: Font weight for avatar initials. Semi-bold for better visibility.

height.$description: Line height for avatar initials. Tight line height for centered single-line text.

textTransform.$description: Text transform for avatar initials. Uppercase for visual consistency and to ensure all initials display in the same case regardless of input data.
